name: African Blocks Puzzle
description:
a Puzzle game  relaxing yet challenging stone style color full block puzzle game that you'll be addicted in no time !!

Relax, Test your mind Place the blocks in 8*8 or 10*10 Grids as you choose and Fill Rows and Columns to Clear the board and beat your Scores

with the different mode to choose from as a beginner you have the Classical Block shapes and to CHALLENGE your self there are a Blast and Time Mode that you have to Clear the Blocks to get rid of the Bombs before they explode in The Blast Mode and Clear row and column Blocks to fill up your time in the Time Mode

and yet you want more Challenge your mind as an ADVANCED or EXPERT Player there are two modes you can play with different Shapes with The Expert Mode you will get new UNIQUE Blocks Shapes that you haven't seen

        HOW TO PLAY STONE BLOCKS Puzzle

*  Drag the stone blocks to the Grid Board

*  Fill Rows and Columns to clear the Blocks from the board

*  Clear multiple Rows and Columns to get more scores

*  Earn as many Scores as you can to beat your Score

*  On Blast mode Clear the Bombs before there time is up and explode

* On Time mode Clear Rows and Columns to Fill Up the time bar

*  Use Bomb Timer Adder to Extend the Timer on the Bombs

*  Use Time Adder to extend the Timer time bar in Time Mode

Play this Amazing game with more than 100+ Shapes
